Overview

HackerRank introduces Engage as a solution that helps you showcase your tech brand to potential applicants. Host real-world technical challenges on a customizable microsite to find the most needed skills and keep the developers engaged with branded email campaigns. 

What's Included in Engage?

Attract new team members with a branded microsite

Build a customizable microsite without coding knowledge to showcase your tech brand and drive registrations for technical challenges.

Note: Use Engage also to run team-based Challenges/Hackathons and gamify your candidate engagement.

Manage relationships with ready-made branded emails (called Campaigns)

Continuously engage and maintain relationships with multi-touch email sequences through the ‘Campaigns’ capability.

Note: With broadcast emails, you can reach out to the candidates of your choice at your preferred time. In this video, you will learn how to send an email to a specific candidate, either immediately or scheduled for later. This capability gives you more control and flexibility in communicating with candidates.

Host real-world technical challenges on a global scale

Give attendees a peek behind the curtain to help them see what life, work, and your company are all about. You can use questions from HackerRank library or from your own question pool and conduct Challenges/Hackathons with up to 3000 active participants making use of non-project questions (Coding/Multiple-choice/File upload) and conduct Challenges with up to 500 active participants making use of project questions (Backend-developer/Front-end developer/Full-stack developer, and so on) as part of Engage's standard package.

Quickly evaluate your candidates 

View the candidates who have completed their assessments using the status field under the candidates tab. Once you have the final pool of candidates, verify their suspicious activity using the suspicious activity marker against the candidate name. You can further evaluate the candidate attempt by moving into the detailed report by clicking on the ‘View Report’ CTA against the candidate attempt.

Need Additional Help?

Get enhanced/customized support from HackerRank for your challenges as mentioned below:

  • Build a custom microsite
  • Get custom content for challenges
  • Create Event leaderboards (for manually evaluated challenges)
  • Scale-up for events
  • Publish targeted ads on our community & publishing a consolidated events post on social media once a month
